articles.title: Reliance-bp, Nayara price petrol, diesel at market rates - The Economic Times
articles.description: Nayara, the largest private fuel retailer that owns over 7 per cent of India's 86,855 petrol pumps, started pricing petrol and diesel at market rates sometime in March and RBML's 1,555 petrol pumps are selling diesel at par from this month.
